name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (GrimFreekStudios)
description:
Dungeon Escape is about a man named Hero. He has to find crystals and lots of secrets hidden around. This game is a 2D top-down, Maze escape game with plenty of mazes and an easter egg or two to find.

If you want to do any speedrunning follow this link https://sites.google.com/view/dungeon-escape-speedruns to see others times and upload your time

Donations are not required but they are very much appreciated. All donations are going to go to our future projects and the people that have helped make this one.
